titles.title: TRADE for Small Businesses and Jobs Act
Transparent Rules Allow Direct Exporting for Small Businesses and Jobs Act
Transparent Rules Allow Direct Exporting for Small Businesses and Jobs Act

To require the collection of up-to-date information on tariff and non-tariff laws, regulations, and practices of foreign countries affecting exports of United States goods and services, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: Transparent Rules Allow Direct Exporting for Small Businesses and Jobs Act or TRADE for Small Businesses and Jobs Act - Directs the Secretary of Commerce and the Secretary of Agriculture to collect information on foreign tariff and non-tariff laws, regulations, and practices affecting exports of U.S. goods and services and U.S. agricultural commodities, respectively. Requires both Secretaries to make such information available to U.S. exporters on the Export.gov website.
